attributes.action: George Cross or Knighthood for the three British cave rescue divers in Thailand.
attributes.additional_details: No references required other than newspaper reports.
attributes.background: Richard Stanton, Robert Harper and John Volanthen, the three cave rescue divers, found the missing Thai schoolchildren. Their heroism and modesty reflects well on Britain and they have given our nation very positive publicity. This is not their first time and such bravery should not go unrewarded.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
